problem.p: Given the following switch statement, what would be the final value of grade if the initial value of score is 52? What if the initial value of score is 89?

// i) initial value of score = 52;
// ii) initial value of score = 89;

div.p: In the above switch statement, break statements are only available in case 9 and case 6. Therefore, the value of grade will be 'A' for scores ranging from 100 to 90; 'C' for scores ranging from 89 to 60 and 'F' for scores below 60.
